WorkItem.ClosedComment: As you noted this is caused by Resharper.
WorkItem.Description:
Code editing and IntelliSense used to work fine with VS2013, but since today when I opened my project (it has been created with the default TypeScript template), there are a lot of squiggly lines in the code editor and the IntelliSense is not working properly.
![Image](http://content.screencast.com/users/markvincze/folders/Jing/media/ce1d25c9-6878-45a8-847f-f1e2b07f4b20/typescripteditorerror.png)
However, building ts files works without any problem, the js output gets generated properly.
WorkItem.Summary: Error messages in VS2013 editor and IntelliSense not working.

Comments.Message: I have found the problem, it was caused by ReSharper. If I suspend ReSharper, it starts to work properly.
